markdown:
<title level="1" right="Trait">[Dhampir](/Traits.aspx?ID=215)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 267 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

A creature with this trait has the dhampir versatile heritage. These [humanoids](/Traits.aspx?ID=91) are the mortal offspring of [vampires](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=97) and members of other ancestries.
name: Dhampir
